mapper.select: select al.txn_primary_key, al.txn_date, al.txn_time, al.acc_type, al.txn_amt, al.acc_total_bal, tl.trans_desc, tl.trans_number, tl.trans_id, tl.pri_b_id, tl.mchnt_code from tb_account_log al LEFT JOIN tb_account_inf ai on al.account_no=ai.account_no LEFT JOIN tb_trans_log tl on al.txn_primary_key=tl.txn_primary_key LEFT JOIN tb_user_inf u on u.user_id=ai.user_id LEFT JOIN tb_channel_user_inf ci on ci.user_id=u.user_id
